supported_tags.remark: list of supported tags, space separated

precedence.remark: priority increases from left to right

weekday.name: Thu
weekday.remark: Sun, Mon, ..., Sat (en_US), single day or duration as Mon-Sat

weekday.name: Fri
weekday.remark: Sun, Mon, ..., Sat (en_US), single day or duration as Mon-Sat

weekend.name: Sat
weekend.remark: Sun, Mon, ..., Sat (en_US), single day or duration as Sat-Sun

weekend.name: Sun
weekend.remark: Sun, Mon, ..., Sat (en_US), single day or duration as Sat-Sun

day.name: MyDay
day.remark: on and off attrs are optional, special day:'today' (==> all days of the week)

once.remark2: This serves as an example for the entries done through telegram.

remark_dummy.remark: tag for inserting once-tags before it

remark_general.remark: on und off are given as HH:MM if mentioned at all
